attributes.review: This app took way too long to download, over a month and a half?! Not to mention it keeps making my phone restart and shut down, over and over again! The app also makes my battery die very quickly!!! Would not recommend to my worst enemy!!!! 😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review:
downloaded this app to vote for out non-racist,non rapist, non disgrace to america orangutan looking president. it did not go that way. when i downloaded this app it asked me my social security number, kidnapped my parrot, sprinkled cancer in my cousins water pipes, and asked if trump was a bad person(which i TOTALLY didn’t say ofc to). DO NOT GET THIS APP! 
 ✨🧚‍♀️🥰Anonymous 2020✨🧚‍♀️🦋
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️ℎ𝑒 𝑑𝑖𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑎𝑡✨🦋 don’t do it again

attributes.review: This app was horribleeeeeee. It started deleting all my photos one by one and replacing them with photo shopped pictures of Danny devito. While I didn’t mind this I was still annoyed it deleted all my other photos especially the ones with Bernie sanders😍😍my fav. Trump needs to stop messing with gen z because we will end him😘🥰
attributes.title: It’s a no🧚🏻✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hope of a way to cure my depression but it took a year to download, it killed my mom, and put my dog in the hospital. I wish I joking but it's true. I thought all the negative reviews were just haters but now I see how this has effected multiple families and has caused many diseases I'm praying for all of you.😿🙏
attributes.title: NOT OKAY!!!

attributes.review: I mean I’ve had some bad apps but this definitely tops the list. If only I could give this app zero stars!! Not only did this app take a ridiculous amount of time to download but it immediately asked to me to enter in my phone number? How inappropriate!! This app is an absolute disgrace to  the App Store and Apple in general.
attributes.title: Wow just wow

attributes.review: This app GAVE ME A VIRUS!! I wanted to get the best experience when downloading because I maybe if I follow up on everything Trump (❤️) does, he’ll finally notice me and LEAVE HIS GOOD GOR NOTHING WIFE!! I WANT HIM ALL TO MYSELF 😡😡😡 anyway, when it FINALLY downloaded after 2 weeks it asked me my age (52 and still hot 😉) but then it started to age/body shame me 😥!!! 0/10 😡 but anyway, I blame the millennials.
attributes.title: PLEASE READ

attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. the second it downloaded, which took several hours, my phone completely shut off. I was just now able to get back on my phone but half of my data saved disappeared. I don’t trust what this app has done to my phone please be safe.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I tried downloading this app so I can get updates on my white rallies that President Trump hosts, but the second I downloaded it my phone became glitchy and slow! Almost as if the app was tracking everything I was doing! This app deserves ZERO STARS and should be taken down! I do NOT want my privacy invaded and I do not trust this app or this President.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. It took forEVER to download and then it kept glitching out and it stole my card data! I have used charges on my card from this stupid app I never agreed too! Would never recommend to anyone other than the forgotten apps on this app store. Another one bites the dust baby.
attributes.title: Horrendous

attributes.review: I am so sad, when I opened the app I saw a pedo and a racist. This made me upset and got me sick. After this I got 100+ text messages to keep America great again. So I deleted the app and will never open it again. And also , take down TikTok, we take down your stupid app. TikTok was my life and I hope your app gets taken down. XoXo
attributes.title: no ❤️
